Text: October SelfHelp Guide Coping with Market Volatility As a registered Multex Investor member we will occasionally contact you with special opportunities provided by our partners To unsubscribe to this or any other exclusive offers please see the bottom of this message Dear Multex Investor Member Even the steeliest market players are inching closer to the edge of their seats Practice may not make Perfect but itll sure help Whether youre trying to avoid the next sucker rally or simply finetuning your investment strategy improve your odds of success Simvest before you investTM The Multex Investor Challenge lets you actively manage a fictional virtual portfolio by placing trades consistent with realtime pricing Experience online investing without risk with a chance of winning in cash and other GREAT prizes Its fun Its educational Its free Trading has just begun so dont miss out Register for the Multex Investor Challenge at multexinvestor Registration runs from October November Trading runs from October December If youd like to learn more about Multex Investor please visit welcomeasp If you cant remember your Multex Investor password andor your user name click here lostinfoasp If you want to update your email address please click on the URL edituinfoasp To remove yourself from the mailing list for Special Promotions please REPLY to THIS email message with the word UNSUBSCRIBE in the subject line You may also unsubscribe on the account update page at edituinfoasp Please send your questions and comments to mailto
